Question: Navigation Instruction given at initial position: [take off then fly toward white building then make a high turn. fly plane toward large building with satellite dish on top then make a left turn. descend plane then land on ground next to trees.]. At the initial position, you are asked to navigate according to a series of movement instructions. When you reach the current location, what is the Landmark Position relative to the large building with the satellite dish on top?  
choose:  
A. I am located on the left side of a large building with a satellite dish on top.  
B. I am farther away from the large building with a satellite dish on top.  
C. I am located above a large building with a satellite dish on top.  
D. I am located under a large building with a satellite dish on top.  
E. I am located on the right side of a large building with a satellite dish on top.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: B; Reason: The current location, as depicted in the frames, shows a view where the large building with the satellite dish on top is visible but not immediately adjacent, indicating that the agent is farther away from it after completing the instructed navigation steps.
